instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Sidebar' layout for the main dashboard.
Use the 'Emerald' color scale for the primary brand color (Buttons, Active States).
Use 'Slate' for neutrals. Do not use pure black.
For the Receptionist view, prioritize DENSITY. Use compact tables.
For the Doctor view, prioritize CLARITY. Use cards and larger text for notes.
Ensure all inputs and buttons have the 'rounded-lg' or 'rounded-md' class, not 'rounded-none'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for the sidebar.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can be added to the background for a premium feel.
